alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:57AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Newton and southern Jasper Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goodland, or near Remington, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Remington, Goodland and Hanging Grove. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
